column3: Cryptojacking or hidden cryptomining is a type of cybercrime where a criminal secretly uses a victim’s computing power to generate cryptocurrency

column3: Intentional use of software by including or inserting in a system for a harmful purpose
Malware is software or firmware intended to perform an unauthorised process that will have an adverse impact on the confidentiality, integrity, or availability of a system
Information that is untrue, misleading, or false and used intentionally (disinformation) or unintentionally (misinformation)
A type of social engineering attack involving deceptive messages intended to reveal sensitive information

column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Ransomware is a type of attack where threat actors take control of a target’s assets and demand a ransom in exchange for the return of the asset’s availability and confidentiality
